snippet: Anders Behring Breivik, who is serving a prison sentence in solitary confinement for the mass murder of 77 people four years ago, won approval Friday to study at Oslo University.
lead_paragraph: Anders Behring Breivik, who is serving a prison sentence in solitary confinement for the mass murder of 77 people four years ago, won approval Friday to study at Oslo University.

headline.main: Norway: Mass Murderer Is Admitted to University, Though Not to Spend Time in Class or on the Campus
headline.print_headline: Norway: Mass Murderer Is Admitted to University, Though Not to Spend Time in Class or on the Campus
